item.description:
Location: South Coastal Bank, 77 Granite St., Quincy, MA
Start Time: 5:30 pm
Date: 2010-08-17
End Time: 7:30 pm
$10 per person/ $15 at the door




Our Non-Profit Partner:



Interfaith Social Services

$10 per person pre-registered/ $15 at the door

A special evening for directors, board members and staff of South Shore non-profits to meet, find out what each are doing, have some FUN, and possibly go home with a donation to your cause!

The evening will include:

  • Appetizers and Drinks
  • A short presentation on retirement plans for Non-Profit Organizations by Heritage Retirement Planning, see Speakers page for more information on presentation.
  • A chance to “win” the 50/50 pool from proceeds from the event for your non-profit organization. (So the more attendees from your organization, the better the chance that you will win!)


Raffle prizes are (more to be added):
The Advisory Board Kit from Susan Hammond
Book by Jane B Ford – Get Grants Now
**All proceeds will go to Non-Profit Organizations.

*Anyone interested in sponsoring please contact Lisa: Lisa@thetoolboxinc.com


Sponsors:
item.name: Networking for Non-Profits
